results.title: Visual Studio Container Tools on Windows - Visual Studio (Windows)
results.description: Explore tools available for working with Docker or Podman containers in Visual Studio for Windows, including CI/CD, and choose whether to work with a Dockerfile, or build a containerized app without a Dockerfile.

descriptions.content: Explore tools available for working with Docker or Podman containers in Visual Studio for Windows, including CI/CD, and choose whether to work with a Dockerfile, or build a containerized app without a Dockerfile.

results.title: Use Docker Compose to deploy multiple containers - Foundry Tools
results.description: Learn how to deploy multiple Azure AI containers. This article shows you how to orchestrate multiple Docker container images by using Docker Compose.

descriptions.content: This article shows you how to orchestrate multiple Docker container images by using Docker Compose.

results.title: Work with multiple containers using Docker Compose - Visual Studio (Windows)
results.description: Create and manage multi-container applications with Docker Compose and Container Tools in Visual Studio, including custom launch profiles.

descriptions.content: Create and manage multi-container applications with Docker Compose and Container Tools in Visual Studio, including custom launch profiles.
